docs.name: Foreman
docs.info: Foreman API v2 is currently the default API version.

resources.name: Gpg keys
resources.full_description:
Description

Documents the calls for the list, read, create, update and delete operations for GPG keys

params.name: id
params.validator: string from 2 to 128 characters containing only alphanumeric characters, space, '_', '-' with no leading or trailing space..

params.name: name
params.validator: string from 2 to 128 characters containing only alphanumeric characters, space, '_', '-' with no leading or trailing space..
